title: PS3 Crimes and Punishments Sherlock Holmes [Eboot fix]
description:
*NOT THE FULL GAME!

PS3 Crimes and Punishments Sherlock Holmes (BLUS31412)

Eboot Fix Only

This is a firmware 4.60 game. Replace files to play game on PS3s with firmware 4.55 or lower.

Step 1 - Download full PS3 Crimes and Punishments Sherlock Holmes (BLUS31412) Game
Step 2 - Copy and Replace the 2 files with these files
Step 3 - Convert game back to ISO to play on ODE
